text: The Uniting Church in Sweden () is a Christian Protestant denomination in Sweden. It was established on 4 June 2011 out of the Baptist Union of Sweden, the United Methodist Church and the Mission Covenant Church of Sweden as the Joint Future Church (). The name was changed during a conference in Karlstad on 11 May 2013. ==Sources== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2011 establishments in Sweden Category:Protestantism in Sweden
title: Uniting Church in Sweden
